GSP33yaissi_u:259_1: kartṛtvasya svasmṛtimātreṇāpi abhyupagantavyatvādvā na doṣaḥ / upādānādisākṣātkartṛpūrvakatvamiti
GSP33yaissi_u:259_2: niyamastu īśvareṇaiva tatra tatra nirvāhyeti ca na vismartavyama / tadarthameva sukhādyapi
GSP33yaissi_u:259_3: pakṣīkṛtamiti bodhyam / vyabhicāraṃ parihṛtya siddhasādhanatāṃ pariharati 'na cobhaye'
GSP33yaissi_u:260: hetimāha 'teṣā' miti / draṣṭumeva tadaśaktānāntadadhiṣṭhānakathā keti bhāvaḥ / nanvīśvarasyāpi adhiṣṭhānasāmarthamadṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ kalpate ?
GSP33yaissi_u:261: tatrāha 'na caivam' iti / adṛṣṭamapi na dṛṣṭavirodhīti bhāvaḥ / kuto na dṛṣṭavirodhaḥ ?
GSP33yaissi_u:262_0: atrāha 'pramāṇāntarata' iti / atra 'tadasiddhe' riti pāṭhaḥ syādveti sandihyate /
GSP33yaissi_u:262_2: tasyāsāmarthyaṃ setsyatītyatrāha 'yathodite' ti / 'tatsiddhe' riti pāṭhe tu śaktimadīśvarasyaiva
GSP33yaissi_u:263_0: tadāha 'yathodite'ti / sidhyannityasyāgre 'hi' iti yojyam / 'sāṃsiddhike' ti / sarvasyārthasya
GSP33yaissi_u:263_2: prāpte / te cākaraṇakatvānnitye eveti bhāvaḥ / 'kāryatvasye' ti / yatra kāryatvaṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:264_0: kulāladeḥ kiñcidviṣayājñānāśaktī api vidyete / tadalpajñālpaśaktikartī vyāptiḥ kāryatvasya
GSP33yaissi_u:264_3: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-yenākareṇa kartuḥ kāraṇatvaṃ tadrūpāvacchinnakartṛpūrvakatvenaiva kāryatvasya
GSP33yaissi_u:264_4: ghaṭādau vyāptirgṛhītā / kiñcidviṣayājñānādimattvena ca na ghaṭādau kāraṇatvaṃ kulālādeḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:264_6: śaktyaśaktī vā aprayojake prakṛtakāryotpāde / tatsamarthakartṛkatvenaiva vyāptiḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:266: tadvaditi / aprayojakatvamevopapādayati 'nahī' ti / ajñānam-arthānatropakaraṇādyajñānam / 'sve' ti / svakāraṇatvenānumīyamānasya
GSP33yaissi_u:267_3: prakṛtakāryasya vyatireka iti vyatirekasahacārasyāsiddheriti vār'thaḥ / mūlapāṭho
GSP33yaissi_u:267_5: yasyeti bahutrīhiḥ / anyapadārtho jñānādirarthasiddhaḥ / tasya pratiyogitayābhāve
GSP33yaissi_u:267_8: pratikṣipati 'api ce' ti / vyāpakaṃ-kāryasya niyatapūrvavṛtti / 'na tāva' prakṛtakāryātiriktasakalakāryopayogijñānasāmarthyavirahaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:267_9: kartari kutrāpyasiddha eveti bhāvaḥ / nanu prakṛtakāryātiriktakatipayaviṣayājñānādi
GSP33yaissi_u:267_10: karturiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ cetyatrāha 'athe' ti / arthāntarayatkiñcidajñānādi na vyavasthitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:267_11: yathā kaścitpaṭakāraḥ ghaṭaṃ na jānāti kaścittu jānāti,
GSP33yaissi_u:268_0: kaścittvanyanna jānāti anyastu tajjānātīti prakṛtakarturanyānyaviṣayaṃ jñānamajñānaṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:268_1: cāvyavasthitaṃ dṛśyate / paṭādyajñānaṃ ghaṭādyajñānaṃ vā niyataṃ karturdurvacamiti
GSP33yaissi_u:268_2: tattadajñānasya tatra tatrānaikāntyānna hetutvamiti bhāvaḥ / sarvasyāpi kartuḥ kiñcidvastu
GSP33yaissi_u:268_3: niyamena na jñāyate iti tu durvacamevetyāha 'na cāstī' ti / nanu svaviśiṣṭajñānābhāvatvenājñānasya
GSP33yaissi_u:268_4: hetutvamupeyate / svapadaṃ prakṛtakāryaparam / vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca jñāne svaniṣṭhaviṣayatvānirūpakatvasvānya
GSP33yaissi_u:268_5: niṣṭhaviṣayatānirūpakatvobhayasambandhena / tathā ca tattadajñānasya tatra tatra
GSP33yaissi_u:271_0: atha śarīratvalakṣaṇaviparītākārākṣepakatvaṃ pariharati 'na ce' ti / kartuḥ śarīravattvameveti
GSP33yaissi_u:271_1: na niyamaḥ / ekaṃ dehaṃ parityajya dehāntaraparigrahaṇaṃ kurvato jīvasya tadā /ḍaśarīritvādita
GSP33yaissi_u:271_2: bhāvaḥ / yogino yogabalājjīvato dehāntaragrahaṇaṃ kurvato jīvasya tadāśarīritvāditi
GSP33yaissi_u:271_3: bhāvaḥ / yogino yogabalājjīvato dehāntaragrahaṇaṃ saśarīrasyaiva dṛṣṭamityayogina
GSP33yaissi_u:271_4: ityuktam / nanu ayogino 'pi sūkṣmaśarīravata eva sthūladehāntaragrahaṇaṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:272_0: pretyeti na vyabhicāra ityatrāha 'pūrveti' / nanu śrutibalādbhūtasūkṣmaiḥ pariṣvaktasyaiva
GSP33yaissi_u:272_1: jīvasya gatyādireṣṭavyā / tānyevendriyaprāṇasaṃsṛṣṭāni sūkṣmadeha ucyate / tathā
GSP33yaissi_u:272_2: ca kartuḥ śarīratvaniyame na vyabhicāra iti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:273_0: atra brūmaḥ / evamapi sthūlaśarīravattvaniyame 'naikāntyaṃ sthitameva / sūkṣmasya
GSP33yaissi_u:273_1: tu na mukhyaṃ śarīratvam / amukhyaṃ ca tadīśvaraṃ prati paramāṇūnāmapyakṣuṇṇameva /
GSP33yaissi_u:274_0: evaṃ śarīropādāne kartṛtvaṃ jīvasyā śarīrasyaiveti samarthya śarīrapreraṇe kartṛtvamapyaśarīrasyaivetyāha
GSP33yaissi_u:275_0: na tu taccharīramapi / adhiṣṭhānakarmībhūtasya kāṣṭhāde stacchettṛtāvacchedakatvaṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:275_1: yathā na tadvaditi bhāvaḥ / nanu svādhiṣṭhātṛsambaddhasya dehasya kathaṃ nādhiṣṭhātṛtāvacchedakatā ?
GSP33yaissi_u:276_0: iti śaṅkate 'adhitiṣṭhāsite' ti / pariharati 'astveke' ti / 'ekatattve' ti prācīnamudritapāṭho
GSP33yaissi_u:276_1: na saṃśuddhaḥ / 'ekatastvasaṃbaddhasye' ti vānyathā vā pāṭhaḥ saṃbhāvyate / atyantato
GSP33yaissi_u:277_0: na tu dehasaṃbandhinā bhāvyamitīti bhāvaḥ / preraṇaṃ prati preryasambandha eva hetuḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:277_1: na dehasambandha ityatra niyāmakaṃ pṛcchati 'kuta' iti / tadvadati 'yata' iti / adhiṣṭhīyamānaṃ-pravartyamānam /
GSP33yaissi_u:277_2: svasaṃbandhinā-preryasaṃyoginā / hastādi viśeṣyamatra / ayamāśayaḥ-śarīriṇa eva pravartakatvamiti
GSP33yaissi_u:277_3: na niyamaḥ / hastāderapi mānadaṇḍādipravartakatvāt / preryasaṃbandhina eva prerakatvamiti ta saṃbhavati,
GSP33yaissi_u:279_0: śaṅkate 'athe' ti / pravartanaṃ nāma paravyāpāraprayojakaprayatnavattvam / tacca
GSP33yaissi_u:279_1: puruṣasyaiva / sa ca svahastavyāpāreṇa mānadaṇḍādi pravartayati / tathā ca dehatadavayavabhinnavastupravartane
GSP33yaissi_u:279_3: śaṅkituḥ / imamapi niyamamanaikāntyenaiva dūṣayati 'tadapi ne' ti / saṅkalpagaruḍadhyānādimānasavyāpāramātreṇa
GSP33yaissi_u:280: 'katham' iti / janyajñānādau dehasya hetutvāditi bhāvaḥ / antarnihitottara ākṣipati 'ki' miti / dehasya kiṃ saṅkalpe kartṛtvam ?
GSP33yaissi_u:281: yena yena tadabhāve saṅkalpo na ghaṭetetyarthaḥ / śaṅkate 'karaṇa' miti / tatra karaṇaṃ śarīramiti cenna,
GSP33yaissi_u:282_0: manasa eva karaṇatvādityarthaḥ / tathā ca śarīrābhāve 'pi svahetoreva saṅkalpo bhaviṣyatīti
GSP33yaissi_u:282_1: bhāvaḥ / nanu manasaḥ karaṇatve 'pi janyajñānādau dehasyāpyastyevāpekṣāvacchedakatayeti
GSP33yaissi_u:283: nānyatra / 'manasaivaitān kāmān paśyan ramateya ete brahmaloke' 'manasaiva jagatsṛṣṭi'-mityādinā muktasyeśvarasya ca manovattvaṃ,
GSP33yaissi_u:284_0: tata eva jñānasaṅkalpādikaṃ ca pratīyate / taddehavigame 'pi manaso nityendriyatvopagamādeva
GSP33yaissi_u:284_2: mate tu na tarāṃ śarīrādyapekṣā / atra manovattvāgantukasaṅkalpādisamarthanaṃ tu
GSP33yaissi_u:284_3: tadekadeśimatena vā siddhāntacchāyayā veti bodhyam / manovattve 'niṣṭaprasaṅgaṃ śaṅkate
GSP33yaissi_u:284_7: bali' riti nyāyāt / śarīritvādyupagame cāsāmarthyaprasaṅgāt / yathācaitattathā 'nacāsmadāde'
GSP33yaissi_u:284_10: sādhīyān / manasaḥ śarīritvādivyāpyatvamapi nirākaroti 'manasa' iti / sarīrābhāve
GSP33yaissi_u:284_12: manaso nāstītyarthaḥ / nanvevamapi saśarīrasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ tatra tatra dṛṣṭāmiti
GSP33yaissi_u:285_0: śarīrikartṛkatvena vyāptiḥ kāryatvasya kuto na gṛhyata ityatrāha 'yāvaddhī' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:285_1: dṛṣṭānuguṇaṃ kāryānugumatvena dṛṣṭamata eva vyāptyupayogi thadrūpaṃ tadavacchinnenaiva
GSP33yaissi_u:285_2: vyāptireṣṭavyā / jñānaśaktyoreva ca kāryānugumatā / te yadyapi karmaparavaśe kulālādau śarīrādhīne ;
GSP33yaissi_u:286_1: parihṛtam / athābhimataviśeṣasiddhiprakāraṃ prapañcayati 'na cāsmadāde' riti / aparyantavistārasya
GSP33yaissi_u:287_1: ghaṭādau na dṛṣṭa iti śaṅkiturbhāvaḥ / sāmānyadharmāvacchinnavyāptigrahādeva pakṣadharmatābalasahakārātpakṣīyasādhya
GSP33yaissi_u:287_2: viśeṣasiddhiriti hārdena pratibandīmāha 'atigahane' ti / śaṅkiturmukhenaiva parahāraṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:289_0: evaṃ manuṣyatvādi sahacaritamipi na kartṛtāvacchedakakoṭighaṭakam / anyatrāpi kartṛtvadarśanāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:289_1: kintu sāmarthyamātraṃ tathetyāha 'yathaive' ti / dhūmātparvate vahniviśeṣānumānāt
GSP33yaissi_u:289_2: kāryatvāt kṣityādau kartṛviśeṣānumānasya na vailakṣaṇyam / yathā tatrābhimataviśeṣasiddhistathā
GSP33yaissi_u:290_0: atha sapakṣadarśanamātreṇa sarvadharmāpādane pratibandī vivakṣurāha 'api ce' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:290_1: vibhudravyasaṃyogina ityanenāvibhutvaṃ manaso vivakṣitam / vibhudvayasaṃyogasya tārkikairanupagamāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:290_3: hi jñānādāvasamavāyihetutvaṃ tanmatam / jñānāyaugapadyācca tasyāṇutvaṃ matam,
GSP33yaissi_u:291_0: niḥsparśatvaṃ ca / sparśavattve bhūtatvaprasaṅgāt / bhūtatve cābhūtaviśeṣaguṇagrahakatvāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:291_1: atrāyaṃ pratitarko vivakṣitaḥ-mano yadi paricchinnaparimāmavat syāt kriyāvadvā tarhi
GSP33yaissi_u:291_2: sparśavadbhavediti / bhūyaḥ sahacāradṛṣṭasyāpi kvacidvyabhicāra ityasyedamekaṃ nidarśanam /
GSP33yaissi_u:291_3: atha nidarśanamanyatpradarśayati 'kathaṃ ce' ti / aniyatādhiṣṭhāneti padanchedaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:291_5: ca bhūyo dṛṣṭam / athāpi vāyavīyatvenānumitasya dehavyāpinastvagindriyasya niyatādhiṣṭhānatvamaspārśanatvaṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:291_6: cābhimatam / atra pratitarkaḥ-tvaco vāyavīyamahatkāryatve udbhūtasparśavattvādi bhavediti /
GSP33yaissi_u:291_9: prabhādau / evaṃ rūpasparśaubhayatadanyatarodbhavasya bhūyo dṛṣṭatve 'pi cakṣuṣo rūpadiṣu rūpādiṣu
GSP33yaissi_u:292_1: cakṣuṣaḥ taijasamahatkaryatve rūpasparśānyatarodbhavaḥ syāditi prasaṅgo 'tra bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:292_6: tadāha 'tadabhyupagama' iti / yathā- manasaḥ sparśavattve bhūtatvaprasaṅgaḥ / bhūtatvānupagame
GSP33yaissi_u:292_8: tadgrāhakatvopagame cābhūtaviśeṣaguṇāgrāhakatvaniyamasyāpi bhaṅga / iti / evaṃ cakṣurādāvapi
GSP33yaissi_u:292_10: tathā ca pratitarkāṇāṃ chinnamūlatvaṃ ca vivakṣitam / 'tathābhyupagama' iti mana-prabhṛterniḥsparśatvādyabhyupagama
GSP33yaissi_u:292_11: ityarthaḥ / tulyanayena kratṛtve saśarīratvamiti niyamo 'pi nāstītyāśayavānāheśvaravādī
GSP33yaissi_u:292_16: iti pakṣe ca dharmasāmānyasya vihitakriyājanyatvaniyamabhaṅgaḥ / akarmatve ceśvarasya
GSP33yaissi_u:292_17: saśarīratvāyogaḥ / taccharīrasya nityatvopagame ca sāvayavatvasya kāryatvavyāpyatvaniyamabhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:293: sahacāramātreṇa kartṛtvasya na saśarīratvādivyāptiḥ, vipakṣe bādhakavirahāditi ca hārdam /
GSP33yaissi_u:294_1: naivaṃ tvīśvarīyaviśeṣāṇāṃ mānasiddhatvamiti cettatrāha 'dṛśyanta' iti / nītayaḥ-nyāyāḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:295_0: anumānāni / īśvare 'pyabhimataviśeṣeṣu santi pramāṇānītyarthaḥ tānyeva prapañcayati
GSP33yaissi_u:295_1: 'yathā' iti / 'tathe' ti pāṭhe tu tathā hi nītayo dṛśyanta ityanvayaḥ / tathā-īśvarīyābhimataviśeṣasādhakāḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:296_2: sādhyavattvena sandihyamānamiti phalitam / sādhyasandehasya pakṣatātvaṃ prācāṃ matam /
GSP33yaissi_u:296_5: saṅkalpaprayatnau prasādhya sākṣātkāramapi tādṛśaṃ sādhayati 'tathe' ti / tadvadeva-kandukādipravṛttivadeva /
GSP33yaissi_u:297_0: upakaraṇaṃ daṇḍādi / tatsākṣātkārī daṇḍena kandukādi pravartayati / tataśca tatra
GSP33yaissi_u:297_2: sādhyate / na caitatsākṣātkartṛtvaṃ jīvānāmiti na taiḥ siddhasādhanam / atīndriyārthānāmapi
GSP33yaissi_u:298_1: iti / tat-paramāṇvādi / atīndriyārthasākṣātkartā kaścit saṃbhavatītyatraiva tātparyamevaṃvadhānumānapratipādakānāṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:298_2: paramācāryāṇām / kṣityādikarturabhimata ekatve prayogamāha 'ekecche' ti / idamacetanaprapañcajātam,
GSP33yaissi_u:311_1: yathā-jīvarakṣārthameva tāvavadīśvarasya jagadvyāpāraḥ / nanu tarhi sukhottarameva
GSP33yaissi_u:311_2: jagat sṛjet / maivam / jīvīyakarmāpekṣayā tathā tathā sarjanāt / nanu karmāpekṣitve
GSP33yaissi_u:311_3: 'naivaśvaryaṃ tasya prasajyeta / na / aparādhānuguṇadaṇḍadharasyeva rājñaḥ tattatkarmaphalaniṣpādakasyeśvarasyāpi
GSP33yaissi_u:311_4: aiśvaryātiśayasyaiva prasiddheḥ / adṛṣṭādīnāmadhiṣṭhātṛtvādi hi tasya mahate vaibhavāya /
GSP33yaissi_u:311_5: yathākarma phalapradatvāt svāmitvamapi sarvasya tasmin pratitiṣṭhatyeva / sarvapradhānatvādṛṣṭādhiṣṭhātṛtvādisādhanapramāṇopanyāsakānāṃ
